ComicInfo.Summary:
The boys try to trick Muggsy into giving them a box of new toys, but they end up in trouble because Muggsy stole the toys.
Skinny tries to get even with Bo after the rabbit takes all the food they brought on their camping trip.
Pete and Oscar try to scare Fraidy in an old deserted house but they're the ones who encounter the real ghosts.
Dizzy thinks the coast is clear when Amster supposedly leaves town, but Amster is really just waiting for the right opportunity to empty Dizzy's refrigerator.
The boys almost find a way to trick Uncle Percy into mowing the lawn himself while still paying them for it.

ComicInfo.Title: No Haunting Allowed!
